title: So, we just got a new /Dev Diary, and it's official...
body:
https://youtu.be/nd7tB99T1hY?t=278

"Well you can definitely expect to see skins for even more overdue champs like **Shen**, Amumu, Rumble, Heimerdinger, Vladimir, ~~Ahri~~, Galio, and yes Aurelion Sol."

Shen's getting a skin!!! Good Gallifrey, men, we've done it!

######Now I need to go find something else to complain about.

replies.body: Riot says a lot of things. I'll believe it when I see it.
They fulfilled their promise for every skin they promised last year, I have hope.
Name checks out.

I too can't wait for the upcoming Ahri-in-a-Shen-Cosplay skin.

She's gonna look so cool in a ninja mask.
https://whitmansyawp.files.wordpress.com/2014/08/tumblr_mylbtwnnvm1s26xido1_400.gif
No no no, Ahri doesn't need a skin like that.  Teemo does, he has so few skins and everyone just loves the little fellow to bits (very tiny bits).

> [{quoted}](name=Riot jinxylord,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=0TZfZMBV,comment-id=001e,timestamp=2018-03-06T23:26:09.714+0000)
>
> I too can't wait for the upcoming Ahri-in-a-Shen-Cosplay skin.
> 
> She's gonna look so cool in a ninja mask.

Maybe...
Chroma for his base skin (kappa)

Deep Terror
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/001/250/147/e6f.jpg

I mean... we could then get Smoke, Reptile, and others of the gang in on the mix. That might not be a _completely_ bad idea.

Just a _mostly_ bad idea
Have a full Mortal Kombat ninja team for One For All.

Imagine if they release a teaser featuring a sword, but it's just Sacred Sword Ahri that throws a spirit blade with her Q :^)

You know, she could fit that theme.
Then they make teaser with ninja dashing through void and it's Void Ninja Lux.
And then they make a teaser with a huge ass ninja with robot arms but it’s just Sword Goddess Miss Fortune.

Teaser with Shen's helmet with glowing eyes

Ninja Trainer Heimerdinger

> [{quoted}](name=5000000000000000,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=0TZfZMBV,comment-id=0006000100000000,timestamp=2018-03-06T21:16:10.786+0000)
>
> Teaser with Shen's helmet with glowing eyes
> 
> Ninja Trainer Heimerdinger

Hey man that one could work.  Give him a little bandana, makes his turrets be out of wood and throw little ninja stars.  Rockets be arrows, and the big turret throws giant shurikens.

Don't jinx it.

Please for the love of god don't jinx it.

Don't freaking
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/misdreavous525sofficialtppage/images/0/0d/Jynx_black_face.png/revision/latest?cb=20121224030636

...god damn it.
Well I just hope for Shen that he won’t get the Cass treatment. Her skin after 4 years of waiting was pretty “meh”.

this video was a clever move on riots part

By giving the promise of new skins for {{champion:32}}{{champion:3}}{{champion:98}}{{champion:68}}{{champion:136}} {{champion:74}} and taking us through the development of what looks to be a awesome set of ssg skins

riot can add in a new skin for {{champion:142}} and a 'joke' about a new skin for {{champion:103}} and receive a lot less negative feedback
I mean, I love the concept of Pool Party Zoe, but I can't help but be angry that she's already getting one before so many other champions.

we all love the concept 
i just love the dream of god kick {{champion:164}} more
Strange, I imagine her with a Warring Kingdoms-esque skin with huge Jade blades and a regal outfit. Gold and red just seem right on her.

If this is the Galio skin, I'm not disappointed. I want to see a giant stone statue in a chicken costume. 

https://i.imgur.com/3cVVPCE.png?noredirect

I'm in love with xayah and rakan skins
but give me that A. Sol skin, my baby boi needs some good lovin{{sticker:sg-lux}}
This Dev Diary was awesome

_**AURELION**_


_**WE DID IT SPACE DAD**_

Ahri gonna get a pool party skin.

GUARANTEE IT.

I wont complain tho.
I hope she gets a Pool Party Skin

whaaat you mean riot actually IS working on things and DOES listen and WILL release skins for not popular/long time coming champs even WITH the release of an ultimate for a popular champ!?!?!?!?!

~~Can someone tell the crybabies in the complain threads?~~

> [{quoted}](name=WeebTrashSupreme,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=0TZfZMBV,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2018-03-06T19:13:19.755+0000)
>
> whaaat you mean riot actually IS working on things and DOES listen and WILL release skins for not popular/long time coming champs even WITH the release of an ultimate for a popular champ!?!?!?!?!

Seems that way, mah dude.
> ~~Can someone tell the crybabies in the complain threads?~~

Just upvote for visibility and I guess it will get the word out? Dunno.
Hoping for Pool Party Ahri :thumbsup:
{{champion:6}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:223}} im still waiting

Aatrox won't get a skin until his visual update happens.  Period.   Riot has confirmed he is on the radar, (I believe it is after Irelia?  So 4-5 months or so?) but till then he is as he is.  No point in making a skin for a champ you are already giving a visual update to in the near future, that just adds extra work load.

I wouldn't be suprised if he gets said new skin within a few patches of the VU, considering how they already have artist working on skins for him anyway in redoing all of his other skins, similar to how Swain got Dragon Master just a patch after his VU.
It's actually going to be a sole gameplay update, but your point still stands.

Watch it be a skin that has a theme, quality, and price range that people won't like.
{{champion:83}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:112}}
People loved Eternum Cass though.
Really? I heard a lot of people getting their panties in a twist over her VFX for the skin.
I like Arclight Yorick, though, and think the others' skins are cool too.
They did also say Dragon Master Swain was going to be a legendary.

Did they really say that?
All that I can remember is that they said that Morello was sure they'd do this kind of skin eventually,but I didn't find anything about it being legendary.
http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3118000&page=15#post34582730

As a Yorick fan, my heart genuinely bleeds for those who like Urgot but will suffer a longer wait for a skin than I did.  I mean, if there isn't a meme to kill or a popular champ to make a skin for, it's not worth Riot's time or Tencent's money to put the effort in.
Still hoping for a {{champion:163}} skin that isn't SSG

> [{quoted}](name=Sexy Jack Rabbit,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=0TZfZMBV,comment-id=0024,timestamp=2018-03-07T00:57:53.406+0000)
>
> Still hoping for a {{champion:163}} skin that isn't SSG

Agreed, Pool Party with water effects and a surfboard with her passive would be cool.
Vladimir? It hasn't been THAT long since Soulstealer, has it? Soulstealer looks so sleek and modern.
Soulstealer was 2014 mate.
But {{champion:6}}
rip poor {{champion:35}}
Now let's just hope it comes with a rework so Shen can be a normal champion once again

We know they're gonna make pool party skins cause Zoe, so I do think Ahri might get one too. Maybe even Aurelion Sol will get one, I can see bubbles everywhere...and he does have his sunglasses anyway
